subSubSection.paragraph:
Opius (Misophthora) similis Fischer, 1972 : 1
–620.
Opius (Allotypus) similis Tobias, 1986 : 59
.

Synonyms.
Opius nodatus Fischer, 1958
;
Opius similiformis Fischer, 1957
b;
Opius periclymeni Fischer, 1964
b.

Distribution in Turkey .
Turkey (Fischer, 1958, 1972 , 1997 ); Bolu, Canakkale, Edirne, Kahramanmaras, Kastamonu, Kirklareli, Sinop, Tekirdag, Yalova(Fischer & Beyarslan, 2005 a); Adiyaman, Çorum, Elazig, Ordu, Sivas (Beyarslan & Fischer, 2011 ); Cankiri (Fischer & Beyarslan, 2011 ); Adıyaman, Çorum, Elazig, Ordu, Sivas (Beyarslan & Fischer, 2011 ).

Distribution. Palaearctic. Austria , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czechoslovakia , Estonia , Finland , France , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Israel , Italy , Kazakhstan , Lithuania , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Russia , Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Turkey , Ukraine , United Kingdom , Yugoslavia .
